name: flame-wheel
effect: Inflicts regular damage. Has a 10% chance to burn the target. Frozen Pokémon may use this move, in which case they will thaw.
short_effect: Has a 10% chance to burn the target. Lets frozen Pokémon thaw themselves.

flavor_text.sword_shield: The user cloaks itself in fire and charges at the target. This may also leave the target with a burn.
flavor_text.legends_arceus: The user cloaks itself in flames and charges at the target to deal damage. This may also leave the target with a burn.
